name: ReVolt (itch) (FiniteGames)
description:
ReVolt is a top down, stealth action game that combines evasion with precise movement. Play as the Fuel Rod Enhanced Droid (FRED), an honest worker droid trying to get by in a dishonest workplace. When FRED finds out that his generation of worker droids is set to be replaced, he must commence a daring escape through the facilities of Nefarious Industries. 

This task won't be easy though. Improved models of the worker droids are on patrol, and Nefarious Industries' security system doesn't take kindly to non-employees. FRED will have to make use of the tools at his disposal if he wants to see another day!
